<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;ca642aa1.1502">   <title>FW: Developing Leaders for a Digital Age Online Course </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;ca642aa1.1502</link>   <description> Hello all,<br><br>Please can you pass this onto any colleagues working in FE and Skills who may be interested in participating in this free online course. The course draws on Jisc work and in particular the emerging findings from the Jisc FE Digital Student project (http://digitalstudent.jiscinvolve.org/wp/fe-and-skills-digital-student-study/)<br><br>Best regards,<br><br>Sarah<br><br>*Developing Leaders for a Digital Age Online Course [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-20T15:47:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paul Richardson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;ca642aa1.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;aeea7377.1502">   <title>OER15, Cardiff: Online registration available at early bird rates </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;aeea7377.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that registration is now open for OER15, the international conference on Open Educational Resources. The 'early bird' rate is available until February 16th. Our venue is the impressive Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama, Cardiff on 14-15 April 2015. Please register with us here: http://oer15.oerconf.org/. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T11:43:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paul Richardson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;aeea7377.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;33743f66.1501">   <title>FW: Webinar: How Open is Open Education? Removing barriers for all staff, students and other learners </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;33743f66.1501</link>   <description> For info. Apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Terry Loane<br>Sent: 20 January 2015 21:46<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;<br>Subject: Webinar: How Open is Open Education? Removing barriers for all staff, students and other learners<br><br>The next free webinar promoted by the ALT Open Education Special Interest Group will take place on Thursday 29 January at 13.00. The subject is: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T07:39:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paul Richardson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;33743f66.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;b818e6e1.1412">   <title>Jisc customer services division launches in 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;b818e6e1.1412</link>   <description> &lt;https://c.na12.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U00000028BRw&amp;oid=00DU0000000IZ5Y&gt;<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>We would like to draw your attention to the following message about how Jisc will deliver support to universities, colleges and skills providers in Wales, from January 2015. Further details, including new email addresses and phone numbers, will be sent out to this list early in the New Year, and will also appear on Jisc's website&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-19T13:42:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Agland J.D.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;b818e6e1.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;fc3d5714.1411">   <title>Digital mapping service for colleges launches to support learners and teachers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;fc3d5714.1411</link>   <description> Jisc Press Release<br><br>Having problems viewing this email? See our online&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/q/1126AMCnQBPKjorHT97/wv&gt; version.<br><br>[Image removed by sender.]<br><br>News release<br>20 November 2014<br><br>Free digital mapping service for colleges launches to support FE sector and help students learn online<br>Today Ordnance Survey and Jisc&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/15U8DdzVqjdkRpLlZTbb8&gt; \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd the charity that offers digital services and solutions to UK education and research \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd are set to release Digimap for Colleges&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/15U9auDQgG4XzFRYnZEUp&gt;. The secure, free and easy to use online mapping service supports further education (FE) institutions and staff, and aids students in their studies. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-25T12:56:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kelly H.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;fc3d5714.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;6f7d8acb.1411">   <title>Jisc RSC Wales eBulletin November 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;6f7d8acb.1411</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>For list members who haven't received a personal copy of the Jisc RSC Wales Bulletin in their inbox, this is just to let everyone know that the November 2014 issue has been published with news, blog posts and events of interest to our customers in all sectors.<br><br>You can download the latest issue from our Moodle at http://bit.ly/JiscRSCWalesBulletin<br>Regards [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-19T14:25:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kelly H.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;6f7d8acb.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;41ce3db8.1411">   <title>Invitation to Jisc FE Digital Student consultation events </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;41ce3db8.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleague<br>We warmly invite you to take part in one of a series of national consultation events being run as part of our FE Digital Student project&lt;http://bit.ly/FEDigitalstudent&gt; from January to April 2015.<br>This Jisc project is exploring FE learners' expectations and experiences of technology and future work will expand the remit to the wider FE and Skills sector. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T15:49:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;41ce3db8.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;dc8b85e8.1410">   <title>App-based Learning </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;dc8b85e8.1410</link>   <description> Good afternoon<br><br>Here is a reminder about a piece of Jisc work currently underway.<br><br>Are you using app-based learning and are happy to share your experiences through a short video?<br><br>Jisc is currently updating its mobile learning resources and would like to invite proposals from learning and teaching staff in HE, FE and Skills for best practice videos around app-based learning. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-28T13:10:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;dc8b85e8.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410">   <title>Free event: Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm forwarding this on behald of the OER Wales Cymru project. It\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds one of a series of free opportunities this term relating to open educational practice in Wales. Feel free to circulate to any interested staff in your networks.<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*****<br><br>Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-13T13:54:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;824c60c2.1410">   <title>Message to Adult Community Education E-Learning Network from Jisc RSC Wales. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;824c60c2.1410</link>   <description> Message to Adult Community Education E-Learning Network from Jisc RSC Wales.<br><br>You may be aware Jisc is currently undergoing a period of transition designed to streamline the organisation, reduce duplication and protect the quality and integrity of its services. We are now at the stage where the Customer Services Division is being reshaped. Pete Scott was appointed to the role of Director Jisc Group Customer Services in April this year and reports to Robert Haymon-Collins as Executive Director, Customer Experience. Robert has published a blog post that gives an overview of the "reshaping" exercise that can be found at: http://www.jisc.ac.uk/blog/towards-a-new-look-customer-service-function-for-jisc-01-jul-2014. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-08T15:31:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;824c60c2.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;47013ec2.1409">   <title>Jisc RSC Wales - Launch of the new Hairdressing Training mobile App </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;47013ec2.1409</link>   <description> We are pleased to announce that today the popular Hairdressing Training service has a new mobile app.<br><br>[cid:image001.png@01CFD0C8.1B82FE80]<br><br>From today the existing portfolio of pioneering hairdressing and barbering training videos, from the award winning service - Hairdressing Training&lt;http://www.hairdressing.ac.uk/&gt;, developed by Mimas, a part of Jisc will be presented and accessible via an easy to use mobile app.<br>The app is the easiest way to access over 60 educational hairdressing and barbering video tutorials mapped to the NVQ curriculum - shared under creative commons licences. The videos have been created by those who teach NVQ/SVQ Levels 1-3 in further education in [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-15T08:33:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kelly H.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;47013ec2.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;4f423b79.1408">   <title>FW: Jisc Inform 40 launches today </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;4f423b79.1408</link>   <description> From: Elizabeth Somerville [mailto:inform@jisc.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 30 July 2014 11:29<br>To: Dacey A.<br>Subject: Jisc Inform 40 launches today<br><br>Jisc Inform 40 - 12 years covering digital, social and policy changes<br><br>Having problems viewing this email? See our online&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/q/1126AMA3hH9UgUHPkN7/wv&gt; version.<br><br>[Jisc Inform 40]&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MTpngbf8oVO6or4XPc2&gt;<br><br>[12 years covering digital, social and policy changes]&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MTWEk65vgywmv3t4iVj&gt;<br><br>[http://jisc.msgfocus.com/files/amf_jisc/project_3/inform40_ft.png]&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MUtVo0VS8beCBFRaMEA&gt;Jisc Inform 40: 12 years of digital learning&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MVytvQCBRqF8OUDnK78&gt;<br>In the 12 years since the first issue of Inform we\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve seen plenty of developments in digital technologies...&lt;http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MW5KzLsYJ3noVx1udQp&gt; [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-30T14:29:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dacey A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;4f423b79.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;34ac5171.1407">   <title>Copyright & disability changes - free lunchtime webinar </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;34ac5171.1407</link>   <description> Jisc Techdis Free Webinar!<br>8 July 2014, 13:00-13:45, Online workshop, TechDis Tuesday&lt;http://www.jisctechdis.ac.uk/techdis/events/detail/2014/tdtuesday08072014&gt;<br>Copyright changes - Join us and Jisc Legal for this 45 minute webinar on the new Copyright and Rights in Performances (Disability) Regulations 2014 which came into effect on 1 June 2014.<br><br>Betty Willder from Jisc Legal will lead this 45 minute session. These regulations extend the previous copyright law, which applied only to the visually impaired, to all disabled persons with an impairment which prevents them enjoying a copyright work to the same extent as someone without the impairment. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T11:38:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barrett E.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;34ac5171.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;1a9d7b69.1406">   <title>FW: EU Commission Study: 'Adult Learners in Digital Learning Environments' </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;1a9d7b69.1406</link>   <description> For info.....<br><br>From: Wendy Ellaway-Lock [mailto:wendy.ellawaylock@niace.org.uk]<br>Sent: 25 June 2014 14:03<br>Cc: Kay Smith<br>Subject: EU Commission Study: 'Adult Learners in Digital Learning Environments'<br><br>Dear Colleague<br><br>Ecorys in partnership with Bertelsmann Stiftung has been commissioned by the Directorate General for Education and Culture (DGEAC) to carry out a study on 'Adult Learners in Digital Learning Environments'. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-26T08:16:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Richardson P.B.R.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;1a9d7b69.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;5fdb85b0.1406">   <title>Jisc RSC Wales FREE events coming up in June and July - a mixture of face to face and online workshops </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;5fdb85b0.1406</link>   <description> Here are details of a few things Jisc RSC Wales have coming up over the next couple of weeks that may be of interest to you...<br><br>Summer Bytes is back on 1st July!<br>This FREE online event consists of four, 45 minute sessions, delivered in one day by Jisc RSC Wales. Sign up once and take part in as many sessions as you wish.<br>Celebrate summer, take a break and join us for a picnic of bytes - we will be sampling eLearning essentials including Wikipedia, Web Conferencing, eSafety and Accessibility. Bon Appetit! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-06T14:41:16+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barrett E.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;5fdb85b0.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;74fa19d5.1406">   <title>Jisc RSC Wales FREE events coming up in June and July - a mixture of face to face and online workshops </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;74fa19d5.1406</link>   <description> Here are details of a few things we have coming up over the next couple of weeks that may be of interest to you...<br><br>Summer Bytes is back on 1st July!<br>This FREE online event consists of four, 45 minute sessions, delivered in one day by Jisc RSC Wales. Sign up once and take part in as many sessions as you wish.<br>Celebrate summer, take a break and join us for a picnic of bytes - we will be sampling eLearning essentials including Wikipedia, Web Conferencing, eSafety and Accessibility. Bon Appetit!
